title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Blockbuster order: Alaska Airlines to buy 110 Boeing planes, including its largest 787 Dreamliner
items.description: Alaska Airlines will add 105 Boeing 737 MAX 10s and five 787-10 Dreamliners to its fleet, the Seattle-based carrier announced.

items.title: Deal of the day: Fly Down Under to Sydney from only 35,000 AAdvantage miles
